/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and lush greenery, creating a harmonious blend of urban and natural elements. A curved overpass gracefully arches over the street, adding a unique architectural element to the cityscape. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are green, gray, and brown, reflecting the city's vibrant yet serene atmosphere.
